sourcesContent:
<template v-if="isOpen">
  <v-card>
    <v-card-text>
      <v-form ref="form" v-model="valid">
        <v-container>
          <v-row>
            <v-col cols="12" md="12" lg="12" xl="12">
              <v-text-field color="primary" variant="underlined" v-model="localReceipt.datE_PURCHASE"
                :rules="[rules.required]" mask="##/##/####" placeholder="Fecha" required />
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
        </v-container>
      </v-form>
    </v-card-text>
    <v-col xs12 sm12 md12 lg12 xl12>
      <v-card-actions>
        <v-btn color="blue" dark class="mb-2" elevation="4" @click="saveReceipt" :disabled="!valid">Guardar</v-btn>
        <v-btn color="red" dark class="mb-2" elevation="4" @click="close">Cancelar</v-btn>
      </v-card-actions>
    </v-col>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {
    modelValue: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: true,
    },
    receipt: {
      type: Object,
      default: () => ({ pK_RECEIPT: null, code: '', datE_PURCHASE: '', datE_REGISTRATION: '', typE_RECEIPT: '', receipT_NUMBER: '', annotations: '', pK_SUPPLIER: null, pK_USER: null, pK_STORE: null }),
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      isOpen: this.modelValue,
      valid: false,
      localReceipt: { ...this.receipt },
      rules: {
        required: (value) => !!value || 'Este campo es requerido.',
      },
    };
  },
  watch: {
    modelValue(newValue) {
      this.isOpen = newValue;
    },
    isOpen(newValue) {
      this.$emit('update:modelValue', newValue);
    },
    receipt: {
      handler(newReceipt) {
        this.localReceipt = { ...newReceipt };
      },
      deep: true,
    },
  },
  methods: {
    close() {
      this.isOpen = false; // Cierra el formulario
      this.$emit('close'); // Emite el evento para que el componente padre lo maneje
    },
    async saveReceipt() {
      if (this.$refs.form.validate()) {
        try {
          await this.$store.dispatch('goodsreceipt/createReceipt', { ...this.localReceipt });
          this.$emit('saved', { ...this.localReceipt });
          this.close();
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('Error al guardar la entrada:', error);
        }
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>
